subject: probability
title: Law of Total Probability
contentHtml: The Law of Total Probability states that the probability of an event can be calculated by summing the probabilities of all possible outcomes weighted by their respective probabilities.
intuition: This theorem allows us to partition the sample space into mutually exclusive and exhaustive events, making it easier to calculate complex probabilities.
